/#ovSi
About
Hidden Hills, a special part, of a special state – close to everything, yet a world apart.
At Hidden Hills, you can live nestled among the oak shaded charm of Hidden Hills.
Come live in a well maintained area of natural beauty, including  rolling hills shaded by statuesque oaks. Enjoy a quiet and comfortable  place to share the joy of living the best years of your life. Certainly,  you have earned the rewards offered at Hidden Hills.

/#homeHeroBlue About ARC Investments ARC Investments is a private, professional property management company specializing in the operation of manufactured home communities and self storage facilities . With over forty years of experience, ARC has a proven track record of Commitment and Expertise. We achieve high quality results that benefit community residents and owners alike. Family owned and operated from the start, ARC's management approach is straight-forward and honest. We set high standards for our personnel and our properties. Our professional staff strives for a long and positive relationship with every resident. We want the communities we operate to be places that homeowners are proud to call "home." ARC's business philosophy recognizes the symbiotic relationship between community residents and the community owner. We seek to maximize value to both through proactive, hands-on management focused on maintenance and improvement of the many facets of community quality. The standards we set for our company over thirty years ago are still very much a part of our philosophy today: competent, friendly personnel, and quality communities that reflect the values of our residents and our company. Welcome to Arroyo Fairways!
